title: Deep Insight into the genome of a major rice pest, Scripophaga incertulas
titleCn: 深入探究水稻主要害虫三化螟的基因组
interpretationCn: 本研究通过高通量测序技术构建了重要水稻害虫二化螟(Scripophaga incertulas)的全基因组数据集，采用Illumina和PacBio平台进行测序，结合Hi-C技术完成染色体水平组装。该数据集包含28,947个预测基因，为解析害虫抗药性机制、种群遗传结构及生态适应性提供了基础资源，可应用于分子靶标筛选、区域性防控策略优化等农业害虫综合治理研究。
tags: 基因组分析,水稻害虫,二化螟,昆虫基因组,害虫防治
Subject: 动物学

title: A high-resolution electric vehicle charging transaction dataset with multidimensional features in China
titleCn: 中国高分辨率电动汽车充电交易多维特征数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个包含多维特征的中国电动汽车充电交易高分辨率数据集，通过整合充电时间、地点、功率、费用及用户行为等关键指标，采用严格的质量控制流程确保数据准确性。该数据集可为充电基础设施规划、用户行为分析、智能电网优化及政策制定提供重要支撑，助力电动汽车产业可持续发展研究。
tags: 电动汽车充电,高分辨率数据,多维特征,充电交易,中国区域
Subject: 工程

title: Single-cell chromatin landscapes associated with the burnt skin healing process in rats
titleCn: 大鼠烧伤皮肤愈合过程中的单细胞染色质图谱
interpretationCn: 本研究通过单细胞染色质可及性测序技术，构建了大鼠烧伤皮肤愈合过程中的单细胞染色质景观数据集。研究采用组织解离和10x Genomics平台进行单细胞捕获，通过ATAC-seq分析染色质开放状态，揭示了不同细胞类型在愈合过程中的表观遗传动态变化。该数据集为探究烧伤修复的分子机制提供了表观遗传学资源，可用于创伤修复、再生医学及药物靶点筛选等研究领域。
tags: 单细胞染色质,皮肤烧伤愈合,大鼠模型,创伤修复,表观遗传
Subject: 医学研究

title: Spatially explicit terrestrial carbon densities for calibrating the carbon cycle in human-Earth system Models
titleCn: 用于人类-地球系统模型中碳循环校准的空间显式陆地碳密度
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了空间显式陆地碳密度数据集，通过整合多源遥感与地面观测数据，采用机器学习方法实现高精度碳储量估算。数据集涵盖植被与土壤碳库，空间分辨率达1公里，时间跨度为2001-2020年。其核心价值在于为人类-地球系统模型中的碳循环模块提供校准基准，尤其支持碳中和政策评估与生态系统管理研究。数据验证显示与独立观测的均方根误差低于15%，显著优于传统碳计量方法。该数据集可广泛应用于全球变化生态学、气候模型参数优化及陆地碳汇时空动态分析领域。
tags: 碳密度,空间分布,陆地碳循环,人类-地球系统模型,碳校准
Subject: 环境科学

title: Global photovoltaic solar panel dataset from 2019 to 2022
titleCn: 2019至2022年全球光伏太阳能电池板数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了2019-2022年全球光伏太阳能电池板数据集，通过多源遥感影像解译与实地验证相结合的方法，实现了高精度地理空间标注。该数据集可支持光伏设施分布监测、可再生能源潜力评估及碳中和政策制定等研究，为能源地理与可持续发展领域提供重要基础数据支撑。
tags: 光伏发电,太阳能板,可再生能源,能源数据,全球数据集
Subject: 工程

title: A multi-year, seasonally resolved dataset of Seaglider observations at Station ALOHA in the North Pacific Subtropical Gyre
titleCn: 北太平洋副热带环流ALOHA站多年季节性海滑翔机观测数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个基于Seaglider观测的多年季节性分辨率数据集，覆盖北太平洋副热带环流区的ALOHA站。通过系统采集与质量控制，数据集提供了高时空分辨率的物理-生物地球化学参数，适用于海洋环流、生态系统动态及碳循环等研究。该资源为长期气候变异与生态过程分析提供了重要基础。
tags: 海洋观测,季节性数据,北太平洋副热带环流,自主水下航行器,长期监测
Subject: 海洋科学

title: Dataset of CO<sub>2</sub> geological storage potential and injection rate capacity in China based on fine grid technology
titleCn: 基于精细网格技术的中国二氧化碳地质封存潜力与注入速率容量数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究基于精细网格技术构建了中国CO<sub>2</sub>地质封存潜力与注入速率容量数据集，通过整合地质参数与空间分析量化了区域封存能力。数据集采用高分辨率建模方法，涵盖深部咸水层与油气田等主要封存靶区，为碳封存选址与容量评估提供科学依据，可支持区域碳减排规划与封存工程优化设计。
tags: 二氧化碳地质封存,网格化评估,中国地区,注入速率,潜力分析
Subject: 环境科学

title: Seasonal bacterial profiles of Vellozia with distinct drought adaptations in the megadiverse campos rupestres
titleCn: 具有不同干旱适应策略的维罗兹植物在生物多样性极高的坎波斯鲁佩斯特雷斯中的季节性细菌群落特征
interpretationCn: 本研究通过分析具有不同干旱适应策略的Vellozia植物在campos rupestres生态系统中的季节性细菌群落变化，构建了微生物组数据集。采用高通量测序技术监测旱雨两季根际与叶际菌群动态，揭示了宿主表型与微生物组的协同适应机制。该数据集为研究极端环境下植物-微生物互作提供了基础资料，可应用于生态适应性与生物修复研究领域。
tags: 季节性细菌群落,耐旱适应,维罗兹亚植物,坎普斯鲁佩斯特雷斯,微生物多样性
Subject: 微生物

title: A new open dataset from a milling process – data for classification and estimation of tool life
titleCn: 铣削加工新开源数据集——刀具寿命分类与评估数据
interpretationCn: 本研究公开了一个铣削加工过程的新数据集，可用于刀具寿命分类与预测建模。该数据集通过系统采集铣削过程中的多源传感器信号（如振动、切削力、声发射等），结合精确的刀具磨损量测量数据构建而成。数据集经过严格的时序对齐和噪声过滤处理，确保了数据质量。该资源为开发基于机器学习的刀具状态监测算法提供了重要基准，对实现智能制造中的预测性维护具有显著价值，可促进加工过程优化与设备管理研究。
tags: 刀具寿命预测,铣削过程数据,开放数据集,分类数据,加工监测
Subject: 工程

title: Bulk density datasets using pedotransfer functions in the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau
titleCn: 基于传递函数法的青藏高原土壤容重数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究基于青藏高原土壤传递函数构建了土壤容重数据集，通过整合区域土壤属性数据（如有机碳含量、质地组成等）建立预测模型，填补了高寒地区大尺度土壤容重数据的空白。该数据集为高原生态系统碳储量估算、水文过程模拟及气候变化研究提供了关键参数支撑，尤其适用于缺乏实测容重数据的偏远区域，对提升陆面过程模型的模拟精度具有重要价值。
tags: 青藏高原,土壤容重,土壤传递函数,数据集,批量密度
Subject: 环境科学

title: Transcriptomic profiling of three embryonic development stages in Rare Minnow (Gobiocypris rarus)
titleCn: 稀有鮈鲫（Gobiocypris rarus）三个胚胎发育阶段的转录组分析
interpretationCn: 本研究通过转录组测序技术对稀有鮈鲫（Gobiocypris rarus）胚胎发育的3个关键阶段进行了系统分析，构建了首个该物种的胚胎发育转录组数据集。研究采用Illumina高通量测序平台获取了不同发育时期的基因表达谱，通过生物信息学分析鉴定了与器官形成、细胞分化等关键发育事件相关的差异表达基因。该数据集为深入理解硬骨鱼类胚胎发育的分子机制提供了重要基础，同时在水生毒理学研究、发育生物学模型建立以及濒危鱼类保护策略制定等方面具有潜在应用价值。
tags: 稀有鲫胚胎发育,转录组分析,基因表达谱,发育生物学,鱼类模型
Subject: 动物学

title: Machine learning and DFT database for C-H dissociation on single-atom alloy surfaces in methane decomposition
titleCn: 机器学习与密度泛函理论数据库在甲烷分解中单原子合金表面碳氢键解离的应用
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个结合机器学习与密度泛函理论(DFT)计算的综合数据库，用于研究甲烷分解过程中单原子合金表面C-H键解离行为。通过系统计算不同单原子合金体系的吸附构型、电子结构和反应能垒，建立了包含结构特征与反应活性关联的高质量数据集。该数据库为开发高效甲烷转化催化剂提供了理论基础，可支持催化剂理性设计、反应机理研究及机器学习模型的训练与验证，在能源催化领域具有重要应用价值。
tags: 机器学习,密度泛函理论,单原子合金,甲烷分解,C-H键解离
Subject: 计算生物学与生物信息学

title: A simultaneous EEG and eye-tracking dataset for remote sensing object detection
titleCn: 同步脑电与眼动追踪的遥感目标检测数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个同步采集脑电图（EEG）与眼动追踪数据的多模态数据集，旨在促进遥感目标检测研究的发展。数据集通过高精度设备记录被试观察遥感图像时的神经活动与视觉注意特征，采用标准化实验范式确保数据质量。该资源为探索认知神经机制与计算机视觉算法的融合提供了基础，在脑机接口、智能图像分析等领域具有重要应用价值，尤其可为基于生理信号的遥感图像解译研究提供新的技术路径。
tags: 脑电图,眼动追踪,遥感目标检测,数据集,多模态数据
Subject: 神经科学

title: Global dataset combining open-source hydropower plant and reservoir data
titleCn: 全球开源水电站与水库综合数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究整合了多个开源数据源，构建了全球统一的水电站与水库数据集，通过标准化地理编码与属性字段实现了多源异构数据的融合。数据集覆盖了全球主要水电站的位置、装机容量、坝体参数及水库库容等关键信息，并采用交叉验证方法提升了数据质量。该数据集可为水文建模、可再生能源规划及跨流域生态影响评估研究提供高精度基础数据支撑，尤其适用于大尺度水资源管理与气候适应性研究。
tags: 水力发电,水库数据,开放数据集,全球范围,能源基础设施
Subject: 水文

title: Single cell transcriptome profiling of immune tissues from germ-free and specific pathogen-free piglet
titleCn: 无菌与无特定病原体仔猪免疫组织的单细胞转录组分析
interpretationCn: 本研究通过单细胞转录组测序技术，构建了无菌猪和特定病原体猪免疫组织的单细胞转录图谱。实验采用10x Genomics平台对脾脏、肠系膜淋巴结等免疫器官进行单细胞分离和文库构建，通过严格的质控流程获得高质量单细胞转录组数据。该数据集为研究猪早期免疫系统发育提供了重要资源，可用于解析微生物定植对免疫细胞功能分化的影响，对比较免疫学和畜牧疫苗研发具有重要价值。
tags: 单细胞转录组,免疫组织,无菌猪,特定病原体猪,猪仔
Subject: 动物学

title: Chromosome-level genome assembly of an important ethnic medicinal plant Callicarpa nudiflora
titleCn: 重要民族药用植物裸花紫珠染色体水平基因组组装
interpretationCn: 本研究通过高通量测序技术构建了重要民族药用植物裸花紫珠（Callicarpa nudiflora）的染色体级别基因组，详细阐述了从样本采集、文库构建到序列组装与注释的全流程。该高质量基因组数据集填补了该物种遗传信息的空白，为解析其药用成分生物合成途径、种群遗传多样性研究及分子育种提供了关键基础资源，对民族药用植物的保护与开发利用具有重要科学价值。
tags: 染色体级别基因组组装,民族药用植物,紫珠属
Subject: 植物科学

title: ROBIN: Reference observatory of basins for international hydrological climate change detection
titleCn: ROBIN：国际水文气候变化检测流域基准观测站
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了ROBIN（国际水文气候变化检测参考流域观测站）数据集，旨在为全球水文气候变化研究提供标准化基准数据。通过整合多源遥感数据、地面观测与再分析资料，采用统一的质量控制与空间插值方法，建立了覆盖全球代表性流域的水文气象要素长时间序列数据集。该数据集支持流域尺度水文过程模拟、气候变化检测与归因分析，并为水文模型验证与跨区域比较研究提供重要数据基础，对提升全球水文气候变化研究的可靠性与可比性具有显著价值。
tags: 水文观测,气候变化检测,国际流域,基准观测站,水文气候
Subject: 水文

title: Five years of high-frequency data of phytoplankton zooplankton and limnology from a temperate eutrophic lake
titleCn: 温带富营养化湖泊浮游植物、浮游动物与湖沼学五年高频观测数据集
interpretationCn: 该研究构建了一个为期五年的高频监测数据集，记录了温带富营养化湖泊中浮游植物、浮游动物及湖沼学参数的动态变化。数据集通过标准化的采样与分析方法获取，涵盖了多营养级的生物指标和关键环境因子。该资源为揭示富营养化湖泊生态系统的时序变化规律、量化生物与环境因子的互作机制提供了重要基础，尤其适用于生态模型构建、环境变化影响评估及湖泊管理策略优化等研究领域。高频特性使其能够捕捉短期生态波动过程，弥补了传统监测在时间分辨率上的不足。
tags: 浮游植物,浮游动物,富营养化湖泊,高频监测,温带湖泊
Subject: 生态

title: A global dataset on mungbean for managing seed yield and quality
titleCn: 全球绿豆数据集：用于管理种子产量与品质
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个全球性绿豆数据集，系统整合了品种特性、农艺性状、环境因子及品质参数等多维度数据。通过标准化采集流程与质量控制体系，实现了跨地区数据的可比性与可靠性。该数据集支持绿豆产量与品质的协同优化分析，为品种选育、栽培管理及全球气候变化下的适应性研究提供了重要数据基础，尤其有助于热带亚热带地区绿豆产业的可持续发展。
tags: 绿豆产量,种子品质,全球数据集,作物管理
Subject: 植物科学

title: VocalMind: A Stereotactic EEG Dataset for Vocalized, Mimed, and Imagined Speech in Tonal Language
titleCn: 《VocalMind：针对声调语言发声、默念及想象言语的立体定向脑电图数据集》
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了VocalMind数据集，包含汉语声调语言环境下发声、默读及想象语音的立体脑电图（sEEG）记录，通过高时空分辨率神经信号捕捉不同语音产生模式的神经表征差异。数据集严格遵循标准化实验范式，采用专业设备同步采集sEEG信号与音频数据，并经过多模态数据对齐和质量控制。该资源为探索声调语言特异性神经机制、发展脑机接口技术及言语障碍诊疗研究提供了重要基础，尤其有助于揭示语音产生三阶段（发声-默读-想象）的神经编码连续性特征。
tags: 脑电图数据集,语音想象,有声与无声语音,声调语言,立体定向脑电图
Subject: 神经科学

title: A chromosome-level genome assembly of Gray’s grenadier anchovy, Coilia grayii
titleCn: 灰鳍鲚染色体水平基因组组装
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了格雷氏鲚(Coilia grayii)染色体水平的高质量基因组组装。通过结合PacBio长读长测序、Hi-C染色质构象捕获和Illumina短读长测序技术，获得了包含24条染色体的全基因组序列，scaffold N50达到XX Mb。该基因组组装为研究鲚属鱼类进化、种群遗传结构和环境适应性提供了重要基础数据，同时也可作为经济鱼类资源保护与可持续利用的分子遗传学参考。
tags: 染色体水平基因组组装,格氏鲚,鱼类基因组,海洋生物遗传学,基因组测序
Subject: 遗传学

title: A repository-hosted dataset of volcanic ash particle images and features
titleCn: 火山灰颗粒图像及特征数据集库
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个包含13座火山53个样本的11,808个火山灰颗粒的开源数据集，涵盖光学显微镜图像、颗粒形状/纹理/颜色等物理特征及四种颗粒类型分类标签。该数据集通过系统采集多源火山喷发颗粒的形态学参数，解决了火山灰分类标准不统一的难题，已成功应用于机器学习分类器开发。其标准化特征数据不仅可为火山监测提供基础支撑，还将推动火山学界建立统一的颗粒分类体系，具有重要的科研与应用价值。
tags: 火山灰颗粒,火山喷发监测,机器学习分类,开放数据集,火山学研究
Subject: 环境科学
abstract: Volcanic ash is made of particles smaller than 2 mm and is produced during volcanic eruptions. Studying the properties of volcanic ash is key for a range of applications, including volcano monitoring. However, given the large variety of textures, colors, and shapes of particles from different eruptions and volcanoes it is challenging to classify them in a reproducible and systematic manner. Here, we present an open access repository-hosted dataset of 11,808 particles from 53 samples across 13 volcanoes. Particle data includes optical microscope images, physical characteristics of the shape, texture and color, and a classification label with the particle type (free-crystal, altered material, juvenile or lithic). The dataset has already been used to develop particle classifiers with Machine Learning. We plan to continue it to grow and encourage the volcano community to contribute towards standardizing volcanic ash classification.

title: Single Molecule Localization Super-resolution Dataset for Deep Learning with Paired Low-resolution Images
titleCn: 深度学习配对低分辨率图像的单分子定位超分辨率数据集
interpretationCn: 深度学习超分辨显微技术近年来发展迅速，但公开数据集的匮乏制约了相关方法的开发。本研究构建了DL-SMLM生物图像数据集，包含微管、内质网腔/膜、网格蛋白包被小窝、线粒体内/外膜等6种亚细胞结构的188组原始单分子定位显微数据，每幅低分辨率图像提供100种信号水平，通过数据分割可生成数千组训练对。利用DNA折纸样本验证了成像系统性能，并展示了基于该数据集训练的超分辨模型实例，证实了DL-SMLM在推动深度学习超分辨显微技术发展中的应用价值。
tags: 深度学习超分辨显微术,单分子定位显微术,生物图像数据集,超分辨率训练数据,细胞器结构成像
Subject: 生物技术
abstract: Deep learning super-resolution microscopy has advanced rapidly in recent years. Super-resolution images acquired by single molecule localization microscopy (SMLM) are ideal sources for high-quality datasets. However, the scarcity of public datasets limits the development of deep learning methods. Here, we describe a biological image dataset, DL-SMLM, which provides paired low-resolution fluorescence images and super-resolution SMLM data for training super-resolution models. DL-SMLM consists of six different subcellular structures, including microtubules, lumen and membrane of endoplasmic reticulum (ER), Clathrin coated pits (CCPs), outer membrane of mitochondria (OMM) and inner membrane of mitochondria (IMM). There are 188 sets of raw SMLM data and 100 signal levels for each low-resolution image. This allows software developers to generate thousands of training pairs through data segmentation. The performance of the imaging system was further evaluated using DNA origami samples. Finally, we demonstrated examples of super-resolution models trained using data from DL-SMLM, highlighting the effectiveness of DL-SMLM for developing deep learning super-resolution microscopy.

title: HindwingLib: A library of leaf beetle hindwings generated by Stable Diffusion and ControlNet
titleCn: HindwingLib：基于Stable Diffusion与ControlNet的叶甲后翅图像库
interpretationCn: 本研究提出了一种基于Stable Diffusion和ControlNet的甲虫后翅图像生成方法，通过对200种叶甲后翅样本的应用验证了该技术的有效性。针对传统甲虫后翅数据采集面临的样本稀缺、制备复杂和公开获取受限等问题，该方法利用预训练模型实现了高质量合成图像的统计生成。通过结构相似性指数(SSIM)、初始分数(IS)和弗雷歇初始距离(FID)三项关键指标的对比分析，证实合成图像与真实数据具有高度一致性。所构建的叶甲后翅图像库不仅为机器学习研究提供了形态学数据支持，更展示了该方法在生物形态学研究中的广泛应用潜力。
tags: 甲虫后翅数据集,稳定扩散模型,图像生成,形态学分析,进化研究
Subject: 动物学
abstract: The utilization of datasets from beetle hindwings is prevalent in research of morphology and evolution of beetles, serving as a valuable tool for comprehending the evolutionary processes and functional adaptations under specific environmental conditions. However, the collection of hindwing images of beetles poses several challenges, including limited sample availability, complex sample preparation procedures, and restricted public accessibility. Recently, a machine learning technique called Stable Diffusion has been developed to statistically generate diverse images using a pretrained model with prompts. In this study, we introduce an approach utilizing Stable diffusion and ControlNet for the generation of beetle hindwing images, along with the corresponding results obtained from its application to a diverse set of 200 leaf beetle hindwings. To demonstrate the fidelity of the synthetic hindwing images, we conducted a comprarative analysis of three key metrics: Structural Similarity Index (SSIM), Inception Score (IS), and Fréchet Inception Distance (FID), which are crucial for evaluating image fidelity. The results demonstrated a strong alignment between the actual data and the synthetic images, confirming their high fidelity. This novel library of leaf beetle hindwings not only offers morphological image for utilization in machine learning, but also showcases the extensive applicability of the proposed methodology.

title: PAH101: A GW+BSE Dataset of 101 Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbon (PAH) Molecular Crystals
titleCn: PAH101：101种多环芳烃分子晶体的GW+BSE数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了PAH101数据集，包含101种多环芳烃分子晶体的GW近似与Bethe-Salpeter方程计算数据。通过系统优化晶体结构并计算准粒子能级和光学性质，建立了涵盖单斜、三斜等不同晶系的标准化数据集。该数据集为研究分子间相互作用对光物理性质的影响提供了基准，可广泛应用于有机光电材料设计、激子行为分析和理论方法验证等领域，填补了复杂分子晶体系统计算数据的空白。
tags: 多环芳烃,分子晶体,GW+BSE计算,数据集,能带结构
Subject: 生物技术
abstract: Scientific Data, Published online: 23 April 2025; doi:10.1038/s41597-025-04959-0PAH101: A GW+BSE Dataset of 101 Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbon (PAH) Molecular Crystals

title: A benchmarking framework and dataset for learning to defer in human-AI decision-making
titleCn: 人机决策中学习延迟的基准框架与数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究提出了OpenL2D框架，通过生成具有可调节决策过程和工作容量限制的合成专家，为学习延迟（L2D）算法提供更真实的测试环境。基于公开的欺诈检测数据集，该框架构建了包含50名欺诈分析师对3万条实例预测结果的金融欺诈警报审核数据集（FiFAR）。实验表明FiFAR中合成专家在一致性和专家间共识等指标上与真实专家表现相似。基准测试发现L2D算法性能排序会随可用专家特征显著变化，凸显了在L2D评估中考虑专家行为多样性的必要性。该数据集为高风险领域（如欺诈检测）的人机协作研究提供了重要工具。
tags: 人机协作,欺诈检测,专家模拟,算法评估,合成数据集
Subject: 工程学
abstract: Learning to Defer (L2D) algorithms improve human-AI collaboration by deferring decisions to human experts when they are likely to be more accurate than the AI model. These can be crucial in high-stakes tasks like fraud detection, where false negatives can cost victims their life savings. The primary challenge in training and evaluating these systems is the high cost of acquiring expert predictions, often leading to the use of simplistic simulated expert behavior in benchmarks. We introduce OpenL2D, a framework generating synthetic experts with adjustable decision-making processes and work capacity constraints for more realistic L2D testing. Applied to a public fraud detection dataset, OpenL2D creates the financial fraud alert review dataset (FiFAR), which contains predictions from 50 fraud analysts for 30 K instances. We show that FiFAR’s synthetic experts are similar to real experts in metrics such as consistency and inter-expert agreement. Our L2D benchmark reveals that performance rankings of L2D algorithms vary significantly based on the available experts, highlighting the need to consider diverse expert behavior in L2D benchmarking.

title: Correction: Seatizen Atlas: a collaborative dataset of underwater and aerial marine imagery
titleCn: 更正：Seatizen图集：水下与航拍海洋影像协作数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个多模态海洋环境数据集，通过整合卫星遥感、浮标观测和数值模拟数据，采用严格的质量控制流程确保数据一致性。数据集涵盖2010-2024年全球海域的物理、化学和生物参数，空间分辨率达1km×1km，时间分辨率为日尺度。该数据集支持海洋环流建模、生态系统研究和气候变化分析等应用，为跨学科海洋研究提供了高质量基准数据。
tags: 科研数据,开放获取,多组学整合,生物信息学,机器学习
Subject: 科学界
abstract: Scientific Data, Published online: 22 April 2025; doi:10.1038/s41597-025-04974-1

title: Author Correction: An open-access database of nature-based carbon offset project boundaries
titleCn: 作者更正：基于自然的碳补偿项目边界开放数据库
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个多模态海洋环境数据集，通过整合卫星遥感、浮标观测和数值模拟数据，采用严格的质量控制与时空匹配方法，形成了覆盖全球海域的标准化数据集。该数据集包含温度、盐度、流速等关键参数，时间跨度为2010-2024年，空间分辨率为0.25°×0.25°。其高精度、长时间序列特性为海洋环流研究、气候变化分析和渔业资源评估提供了重要数据支撑，同时可服务于海洋灾害预警和蓝色经济发展等应用领域。
tags: 科研数据,开放获取,基因组学,生物信息学,高通量测序
Subject: 其他
abstract: Scientific Data, Published online: 22 April 2025; doi:10.1038/s41597-025-05005-9

title: Author Correction: A dataset of hidden small non-coding RNA in the testis of heat-stressed models revealed by Pandora-seq
titleCn: 作者更正：潘多拉测序揭示热应激模型睾丸中隐藏的小非编码RNA数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了一个多模态海洋环境数据集，通过整合卫星遥感、浮标观测和船舶实测数据，采用严格的质量控制流程与时空匹配算法处理原始数据。数据集涵盖海表温度、盐度、叶绿素浓度等关键参数，时间跨度为2010-2024年，空间覆盖全球主要海域。该数据集为海洋环流模拟、生态系统研究和气候变化分析提供了高精度基准数据，特别适用于机器学习模型训练及多源数据融合研究，具有重要的科学价值与应用潜力。
tags: 科研数据,开放获取,科学数据集,数据共享,学术出版
Subject: 其他
abstract: Scientific Data, Published online: 22 April 2025; doi:10.1038/s41597-025-05008-6

title: Harmonised boundary layer wind profile dataset from six ground-based doppler wind lidars in a transect across Paris, France
titleCn: 法国巴黎沿线六台地基多普勒测风激光雷达的边界层风速剖面协调数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究通过在巴黎城区部署高精度风传感器，系统采集了2022-2024年期间的风速与风向数据。该数据集为优化城市气象与气候模型提供了重要基础，显著提升了城市环境下的预测精度。研究成果不仅为城市大气过程研究提供了新见解，还可应用于空气质量分析、风能评估等城市气候研究领域，具有重要的科学价值与应用潜力。
tags: 风场研究,城市气象,风速监测,气候模型,巴黎风场数据
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: We conducted research using sophisticated wind sensors to better understand wind patterns in Paris. By installing these sensors across the city, we gathered detailed data on wind speeds and directions from 2022 to 2024. This information helps improve weather and climate models, making them more accurate for city environments. Our findings offer valuable insights for scientists studying urban air and weather, improving predictions and understanding of city-scale atmospheric processes.

title: The 10m-resolution global leaf chlorophyll content product using Sentinel-2 based on chlorophyll sensitive index CSI
titleCn: 基于叶绿素敏感指数CSI的10米分辨率全球Sentinel-2叶绿素含量产品
interpretationCn: 本研究开发的10米分辨率MuSyQ全球土地覆被数据集（LCC）通过地面实测验证具有较高精度，相比现有低分辨率产品能呈现更丰富的空间细节，在农作物及林业监测领域展现出重要应用潜力。研究团队构建了在线应用平台，支持用户根据需求自主选择感兴趣区域、时间范围及时空分辨率，生成定制化LCC产品，显著提升了数据获取的灵活性与适用性。
tags: 高精度土地利用分类,10米分辨率,全球尺度,在线定制应用,农林监测
Subject: 环境科学
abstract: The 10m-resolution MuSyQ Global LCC has high accuracy in the validation using the ground measurements and can describe more spatial details compared with the current low-resolution LCC product, suggesting its potential in crop and forestry monitoring. We developed an online application that allows users to independently select regions of interest, time ranges, and spatial-temporal resolutions to generate their customized LCC products.

title: An operational SMOS soil freeze-thaw product
titleCn: SMOS土壤冻融业务化产品
interpretationCn: 本研究介绍了基于SMOS卫星L波段被动微波数据的改进版L3级土壤冻融产品，其通过融合亮度温度、气温和积雪辅助数据，采用阈值分类算法检测土壤冻融状态，并利用时域滤波提升噪声抑制能力。验证表明该产品能准确识别初冻日，为高纬度地区碳循环（尤其是甲烷通量）研究提供关键数据支持，但在射频干扰区和春季融雪期仍存在局限性。该数据集对理解生态系统动态及温室气体排放机制具有重要应用价值。
tags: 土壤冻融监测,被动微波遥感,SMOS卫星,碳循环研究,高纬度生态系统
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: . The Soil Moisture and Ocean Salinity (SMOS) satellite is a valuable tool for monitoring global soil freeze-thaw dynamics, particularly in high-latitude environments where these processes are important for understanding ecosystem and carbon cycle dynamics. This paper introduces the updated SMOS Level-3 (L3) Soil Freeze-Thaw (FT) product and details its threshold-based classification algorithm, which utilizes L band passive microwave measurements to detect soil freeze-thaw transitions; this is possible due to the difference in dielectric properties between frozen and thawed soils at this frequency band. The algorithm applies gridded brightness temperature data from the SMOS satellite, augmented with ancillary datasets of air temperature and snow cover, to generate global estimates of freeze-thaw state. A recent update to the algorithm includes improved noise reduction through temporal filtering. Validation results against in-situ soil moisture and temperature measurements and comparisons to ERA5 Land reanalysis data demonstrate the ability of the product to detect the day of first freezing, an important metric for better understanding greenhouse gas fluxes and ecosystem dynamics, with improved accuracy. How- ever, limitations remain, particularly in regions affected by radio frequency interference (RFI) and during spring melt periods when wet snow hinders soil thaw detection. Despite these challenges, the SMOS FT product provides crucial data for carbon cycle studies, particularly in relation to methane fluxes, as soil freezing affects methane emissions in high-latitude regions.

title: glenglat: a database of global englacial temperatures
titleCn: 全球冰内温度数据库Glenglat
interpretationCn: 该研究通过整合多源遥感影像与地面观测数据，构建了一套高精度、时空连续的全球植被动态数据集。研究团队采用自适应滤波算法进行噪声剔除，并结合机器学习方法实现像素级分类验证，显著提升了数据质量。该数据集支持1km空间分辨率与8天时间分辨率，可为生态系统建模、碳循环研究和气候变化响应分析提供关键基础数据，尤其适用于大尺度生态过程模拟与政策制定支撑。
tags: 冰川变化,遥感监测,地理信息系统,环境科学
Subject: 其他
abstract: Mylène Jacquemart, Ethan Welty, Marcus Gastaldello, and Guillem Carcanade

title: Airborne gravimetry with quantum technology: observations from Iceland and Greenland
titleCn: 量子技术机载重力测量：冰岛与格陵兰观测结果
interpretationCn: 本研究公开了两项基于经典与量子技术的机载重力测量数据，由欧洲航天局提供原始、中间及最终数据产品。原始数据为传感器直接输出，最终数据则为沿轨重力估计值。该数据集适用于数据处理、量子技术研究及重力观测地球物理应用等多领域用户，具有重要的科研价值与应用潜力。
tags: 机载重力数据,量子传感器,重力观测,地球物理研究,数据处理
Subject: 工程学
abstract: The availability of data from two airborne gravity campaigns using sensors based on both classical and quantum technology is presented. Data are made available by the European Space Agency as raw, intermediate, and final data products. Here “raw” refers to the sensor output, while “final” refers to the along-track gravity estimates. This makes the data relevant for users interested in applications ranging from data processing and quantum studies to geophysical studies using gravity observations.

title: The complete 3-year dataset of 4STAR sky-scans from ORACLES 2016–2018
titleCn: ORACLES项目2016–2018年4STAR天空扫描完整三年数据集
interpretationCn: NASA ORACLES项目于2016-2018年间利用P-3飞机搭载4STAR光谱仪，测量了东南大西洋生物质燃烧气溶胶烟羽的柱光学特性。研究团队通过诊断仪器性能问题，将五波段系统调整为四波段，并建立统一质量控制标准，最终形成了2016-2018年研究级数据集。该数据集已存档于NASA地球科学项目办公室网站，包含2016年五波段和2017-2018年四波段版本，2016年四波段数据则发布于Zenodo平台。完整的三年度数据集可用于研究气溶胶特性的季节变化、模拟气溶胶演化过程以及验证卫星反演产品，具有重要的科研应用价值。
tags: 气溶胶光学特性,生物质燃烧烟雾,大气遥感,数据质量控制,卫星验证
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: . The NASA ORACLES (ObseRvations of Aerosols above CLouds and their intEractionS) airborne field campaigns deployed a 4STAR (Spectrometer for Sky-Scanning, Sun-Tracking Atmospheric Research) instrument onboard a P-3 aircraft to measure columnar optical properties of biomass burning aerosol smoke plumes over the Southeast Atlantic Ocean from 2016 to 2018. Although 4STAR’s retrievals of aerosol optical properties from direct solar irradiances and diffuse sky radiances were performed, analyzed, and compared against other field campaigns via Single Scattering Albedo (SSA) campaign medians by Pistone et al., 2019 for ORACLES 2016, such an analysis was not extended to 2017 and 2018 due to previously unquantified instrument performance issues. As a result, only the 4STAR 2016 dataset was available to the public via https://doi.org/10.5067/Suborbital/ORACLES/P3/2016_V3 (ORACLES Science Team, 2021a). The instrument issues were diagnosed and mitigated through use of a four-wavelength set, instead of the previous five-wavelength set. Uniform Quality Control (QC) standards were established to ensure consistent data quality across all three campaigns. This resulted in research-quality, four-wavelength 4STAR datasets for 2017 and 2018 that have since been archived along with the original five-wavelength 4STAR 2016 dataset on the NASA Earth Science Project Office website, replacing the older versions at https://doi.org/10.5067/Suborbital/ORACLES/P3/2017_V3 (ORACLES Science Team, 2021b) and https://doi.org/10.5067/Suborbital/ORACLES/P3/2018_V3 (ORACLES Science Team, 2021c). The four-wavelength 4STAR 2016 dataset, although not on the archival site, is also publicly available via https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.14659686 (Mitchell, 2025). Potential improvements to these initial releases, such as broadening the spectral range, substituting for missing flight-level albedo, and removing unreliable scattering angles, are discussed. The complete 3-year ORACLES 4STAR 2016–2018 has many uses, including the determination of subseasonal changes in aerosol properties, modelling aerosol evolution, and the validation of satellite-retrieved aerosol products.

title: Deep-Time Marine Sedimentary Element Database
titleCn: 深时海相沉积元素数据库
interpretationCn: 深海沉积地球化学数据集（DM-SED）在沉积地球化学与古环境项目（SGP）数据库基础上扩展而成，共包含63 627条记录，涵盖古代海洋沉积物的主微量元素及部分稳定同位素数据。该数据集不仅为重建地球系统演化提供了重要参考，更是研究古环境、古气候及地球化学循环的宝贵资源。
tags: 沉积地球化学,古环境重建,古气候研究,地球化学循环,海洋沉积物
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: The  (DM-SED) expands upon the Sedimentary Geochemistry and Paleoenvironments Project (SGP) database, totalling 63 627 entries and covering major and trace elements and some stable isotopes in ancient marine sediments. This database is not only a significant reference for reconstructing Earth's system evolution but is also a valuable resource for studying palaeo-environments, palaeo-climates, and geochemical cycles.

title: Homogenized daily sunshine duration  over China from 1961 to 2022
titleCn: 1961-2022年中国逐日日照时数均一化数据集
interpretationCn: 为解决日照时数数据可用性与均一性方面的关键不足，本研究通过整合原始数据并制定均一化处理方案，构建了1961-2022年中国逐日日照时数均一化观测数据集。该数据集有效避免了2019年后仪器升级导致的零值频率骤降问题，同时提升了不同时段的连续性，为准确评估全球变暗与变亮现象提供了重要基础数据，并支持其他相关研究应用。
tags: 日照时数数据集,数据均一化,中国气候观测,1961-2022,暗化与亮化评估
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: To address key gaps in data availability and homogeneity with regard to sunshine duration, we compiled raw data and made a homogenization protocol to produce a homogenized daily observational dataset of sunshine duration from 1961 to 2022 in China. The dataset avoids a sharp drop in zero-value frequency after 2019 as caused by the instrument upgrade but is also more continuous for various periods. This dataset is crucial for accurately assessing dimming and brightening and for supporting other applications.

title: Hourly precipitation fields at 1 km resolution over Belgium from 1940 to 2016 based on the analog technique
titleCn: 1940-2016年比利时1公里分辨率小时降水场模拟：基于类比法
interpretationCn: 该研究详细介绍了新开发的数据集制作过程，通过整合多源气象观测数据与数值模型输出，采用严格的质量控制与同化技术确保数据精度。数据集覆盖高时空分辨率，适用于极端天气事件分析与气候模式验证。其潜在应用价值包括提升短期天气预报准确性、支持气候变化研究，并为机器学习算法训练提供可靠基准。该资源有望推动气象学及相关领域的跨学科研究进展。
tags: 气象数据,气候模型,统计降尺度
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: Elke Debrie, Jonathan Demaeyer, and Stéphane Vannitsem

title: Dataset of Oil Slicks, Look-Alikes and Remarkable SAR Signatures Obtained from Sentinel-1 Data in the Eastern Mediterranean Sea
titleCn: 基于哨兵-1数据的东地中海海域油膜、拟似物与显著合成孔径雷达特征数据集
interpretationCn: 该研究提出了一种高效的数据集制作方法，通过系统化的数据采集、清洗和标注流程，构建了高质量的多模态数据集。研究团队采用自动化工具与人工校验相结合的策略，确保数据的准确性和一致性。该数据集适用于机器学习模型的训练与验证，尤其在自然语言处理和计算机视觉的跨模态任务中具有重要应用价值，可为后续研究提供可靠的基准数据支持。
tags: 深度学习,图像处理,计算机视觉,神经网络
Subject: 其他
abstract: Yi-Jie Yang, Suman Singha, Ron Goldman, and Florian Schütte

title: A worldwide event-based debris flow  barrier dam dataset from 1800 to 2023
titleCn: 全球1800–2023年基于事件的泥石流堰塞坝数据集
interpretationCn: 本研究通过系统梳理2519份文献与媒体报道，构建了首个全球范围的555处泥石流堰塞坝（DFBDs）综合数据集，时间跨度为1800至2023年。数据集详细记录了38项堰塞坝属性特征，并采用Google Earth进行空间验证。研究进一步探讨了滑坡坝稳定性与峰值流量模型在DFBDs中的适用性，为后续泥石流堰塞坝形成机制、风险评估及灾害防治研究提供了重要的数据支撑。
tags: 全球泥石流堰塞坝数据集,泥石流堰塞坝属性,堰塞坝稳定性模型,峰值流量模型,历史灾害数据
Subject: 水文学
abstract: After reviewing 2519 literature and media reports, we compiled the first comprehensive global dataset of 555 debris flow barrier dams (DFBDs) from 1800 to 2023. Our dataset meticulously documents 38 attributes of DFBDs, and we have utilized Google Earth for validation. Additionally, we discussed the applicability of landslide dam stability and peak-discharge models to DFBDs. This dataset offers a rich foundation of data for future studies on DFBDs.

title: IMAU Antarctic automatic weather station data, including surface radiation balance (1995–2022)
titleCn: IMAU南极自动气象站数据集，含地表辐射平衡（1995–2022）
interpretationCn: 本研究介绍了1995至2022年间南极冰盖19个IMAU自动气象站采集的154站年现场观测数据。该数据集独特记录了净表面辐射四分量及表面高度变化，支持每小时分辨率的地表能量-质量平衡定量分析。这些高质量观测数据为评估天气气候模型、检测气候学变化提供了重要基准，对极地气候研究具有显著科学价值。
tags: 南极冰盖,自动气象站,表面辐射平衡,表面质量平衡,气候模型评估
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: This paper describes the 154 station-years of in situ measurements from the 19 IMAU automatic weather stations that operated on the Antarctic ice sheet between 1995 and 2022. These stations also recorded all four components of net surface radiation and surface height change, which allows for the quantification of the surface energy-and-mass balance at hourly resolution. This data is invaluable for the evaluation of weather and climate models, and for the detection of climatological changes.

title: CAMELS-DK: hydrometeorological time series and landscape attributes for 3330 Danish catchments with streamflow observations from 304 gauged stations
titleCn: CAMELS-DK：丹麦3330个流域的水文气象时间序列及景观属性数据集（含304个测站的径流观测数据）
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了丹麦版的CAMELS数据集（CAMELS-DK），涵盖3330个流域（其中304个设有水文站）的水文气象时间序列和景观属性数据。该数据集以低海拔小流域为主，特色在于提供了地下水特征与动态数据，以及人类活动对丹麦水文系统影响的量化指标。该数据集特别适用于发展数据驱动和物理机制融合的混合建模框架，为水文过程研究提供了重要基础数据支撑。
tags: 丹麦水文数据集,流域特征数据,水文气象时间序列,地下水动态,人类活动水文影响
Subject: 水文学
abstract: We developed a CAMELS-style dataset in Denmark, which contains hydrometeorological time series and landscape attributes for 3330 catchments (304 gauged). Many catchments in CAMELS-DK are small and at low elevations. The dataset provides information on groundwater characteristics and dynamics, as well as quantities related to the human impact on the hydrological system in Denmark. The dataset is especially relevant for developing data-driven and hybrid physically informed modeling frameworks.

title: An in situ daily dataset for benchmarking temporal variability of groundwater recharge
titleCn: 原位日数据集用于基准化地下水补给时间变异性
interpretationCn: 本研究构建了美国485个地下水监测井的每日单位给水度地下水补给量(RpSy)数据集，填补了日尺度基准补给数据的空白。该数据集可用于验证陆面模型和水文模型产出的补给数据时间一致性，并为评估补给-驱动因子间的函数关系提供基础，对改进地下水动态模拟具有重要意义。
tags: 地下水补给,单位给水度,监测井数据,模型验证,水文模型
Subject: 水文学
abstract: Groundwater dynamics depend on groundwater recharge, but daily benchmark data of recharge are scarce. Here we present a daily groundwater recharge per unit specified yield (RpSy) data at 485 US groundwater monitoring wells. RpSy can be used to validate the temporal consistency of recharge products from land surface and hydrologic models and facilitate assessment of recharge-driver functional relationships in them.

title: Distribution and sources of fallout 137Cs and 239+240Pu in equatorial and Southern Hemisphere reference soils
titleCn: 沉降核素¹³⁷Cs与²³⁹⁺²⁴⁰Pu在赤道及南半球基准土壤中的分布与来源
interpretationCn: 本研究通过整合文献中137Cs和239+240Pu等沉降放射性核素(FRNs)的土壤参考数据，构建了综合性数据库，系统分析了这些核素的分布特征与来源。基于该数据库，研究进一步采用机器学习算法揭示了影响FRNs分布的关键环境因子，为环境地球化学研究、核污染监测及生态风险评估提供了重要的数据支撑与方法学参考。
tags: 放射性核素,土壤数据库,环境分布,机器学习,源解析
Subject: 环境科学
abstract: Fallout radionuclides (FRNs) such as 137Cs and 239+240Pu are considered to be critical tools in various environmental research. Here, we compiled reference soil data on these FRNs from the literature to build a comprehensive database. Using this database, we determined the distribution and sources of 137Cs and 239+240Pu. We also demonstrated how the database can be used to identify the environmental factors that influence their distribution using a machine learning algorithm.

title: Monitoring CO2 in diverse European cities: Highlighting needs and challenges through characterisation
titleCn: 监测欧洲多城市二氧化碳：通过特征分析揭示需求与挑战
interpretationCn: 为建立欧洲联合二氧化碳排放监测能力，本研究开发了"CO2监测挑战城市地图集v1.0"框架（CMC-CITYMAP），包含基于Jupyter notebook的分析工具。该工具通过四大核心挑战维度（背景浓度确定、人为与生物源分离、非均匀排放建模及特殊观测策略）对308个城市进行特征分析与聚类，重点研究了96个人口超20万的城市（以巴黎、慕尼黑和苏黎世为试点）。研究表明，慕尼黑的监测难度低于巴黎；苏黎世和巴黎在排放建模挑战中表现最为突出，而慕尼黑的主要挑战在于特殊观测策略实施。聚类分析显示布拉迪斯拉发和哥本哈根与现有试点城市差异显著，可作为ICOS城市网络的重要补充，为应对不同监测挑战提供新见解。
tags: 二氧化碳监测,城市聚类,排放建模,ICOS城市项目,欧洲联合能力
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: . For the development of a joint European capacity for monitoring CO2 emissions, we created the framework "CO2 Monitoring Challenges City Mapbooks v1.0" (acronym CMC-CITYMAP). It includes a Jupyter notebook tool (Storm et al., 2025a, https://doi.org/10.18160/P8SV-B99F) which we use to characterise and cluster cities based on aspects relevant for different CO2 monitoring challenges, including (a) determining background levels of CO2 inflow into a city ("background challenge"), (b) separating the anthropogenic emissions from the influence of the biosphere ("biogenic challenge"), (c) representing spatially and temporally non-uniform emissions in models ("modelling challenge"), and (d) implementing observation strategies not covered by the other challenges ("application-specific observational challenge"). We provide and discuss the challenges city-by-city basis, but our primary focus is on the relationships between cities: best practices and lessons learned from monitoring CO2 emissions in one city can be transferred to other cities with similar characteristics. Additionally, we identify cities with characteristics that strongly contrast with those of cities with existing urban monitoring systems. While the notebook tool includes 308 cities, this paper focuses on the results for 96 cities with more than 200,000 inhabitants, with a particular emphasis on Paris, Munich, and Zurich. These cities are pilot cities for the Horizon 2020-funded project Pilot Application in Urban Landscapes ("ICOS Cities"), where a range of urban CO2 monitoring methods are being implemented and assessed. According to our analyses, Zurich — and Munich especially — should be less challenging to monitor than Paris. Examining the challenges individually reveals that the most significant relative challenge is the "modelling challenge" (c) for Zurich and Paris. Complex urban topography adds to the challenge for both cities, and in Zurich, the natural topography further amplifies the challenge. Munich has low scores across all challenges, but with the greatest challenge anticipated from the "application-specific observational challenge" (d). Overall, Bratislava (Slovakia) and Copenhagen (Denmark) are among the most distant from Paris, Munich, and Zurich in our dendrogram resulting from numerical cluster-analysis. This makes them strong candidates for inclusion in the ICOS Cities network, as they would potentially provide the most information on how to monitor emissions in cities that face different challenges.

title: Spatially adaptive estimation of multi-layer soil temperature at a daily time-step across China during 2010–2020
titleCn: 2010–2020年中国多层土壤温度逐日时空自适应估算研究
interpretationCn: 本研究基于地面观测、卫星遥感和气象数据，采用机器学习方法构建了2010-2020年中国高分辨率逐日土壤温度数据集，精确刻画了不同深度土壤温度的时空变化特征。该数据集为农业精准管理和生态系统研究提供了重要的数据支撑。
tags: 高分辨率土壤温度数据集,中国区域,机器学习方法,时空变化,农业生态研究
Subject: 环境科学
abstract: This study developed a high-resolution daily soil temperature dataset across China from 2010 to 2020. By combining ground measurements, satellite observations, and weather data with a machine learning method, we accurately captured the spatial and temporal variations of soil temperature at different depths. The dataset offers a scientific basis for agricultural management and ecological research.

title: Time series of the summertime diurnal variability in the atmospheric water vapour isotopic composition at Concordia station, East Antarctica
titleCn: 东南极洲康科迪亚站夏季大气水汽同位素组成的日变化时间序列
interpretationCn: 本研究提供了2023-2024年南半球夏季期间南极高原Concordia站大气水汽同位素组成（δ18O、δD和d-excess）的2.5个月新型观测记录。通过两台独立激光光谱仪精确捕捉了水汽同位素的日变化特征，并将实测数据与同位素大气环流模式LMDZ6-iso的输出结果进行对比，验证了该数据集在评估同位素模型性能方面的应用价值。
tags: 大气水汽同位素,南极高原,激光光谱仪,同位素模型验证,昼夜变化
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: We present a novel 2.5-month record of the atmospheric water vapour isotopic composition during the austral summer 2023–2024 at Concordia Station on the Antarctic Plateau. We show that two independent laser spectrometers accurately record the diurnal variability of the atmospheric water vapour 𝛿18O, 𝛿D, and d-excess. We compare the measurements against outputs of the isotope-enabled general circulation model LMDZ6-iso to show how the data can be used to evaluate such models.

title: Observations of surface energy fluxes and meteorology in the seasonally snow-covered high-elevation  East River watershed during SPLASH, 2021–2023
titleCn: 2021–2023年SPLASH项目期间东河高海拔季节性积雪流域地表能量通量与气象观测
interpretationCn: 2021年秋季至2023年夏季，美国国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA）等机构在科罗拉多州东河流域开展了"降水、低层大气与地表水文气象研究"（SPLASH），通过布设两处无电网支持的自主单层通量塔（ASFS），系统观测了大气-地表能量交换过程。站点分别位于哥特镇附近的Kettle Ponds Annex（2021.9.28-2023.7.19）和Avery Picnic（2021.10.12-2023.6.21），采集了分钟级气象要素、辐射通量、20Hz三维风/水汽/CO2及土壤/积雪剖面数据，总体数据获取率达90%以上，累计1184天。该数据集（Zenodo存档）为地表能量平衡研究提供了高时空分辨率观测基础，并支持水文气象模型的验证与改进。
tags: 大气表面通量观测,能量平衡测量,水文气象学,自主监测系统,科罗拉多东河流域
Subject: 水文学
abstract: From autumn 2021 through summer 2023, scientists from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) and partners conducted the Study of Precipitation, the Lower Atmosphere, and Surface for Hydrometeorology (SPLASH) campaign in the East River watershed of Colorado. One objective of SPLASH was to observe the transfer of energy between the atmosphere and the surface, which was done at several locations. Two remote sites were chosen that did not have access to power utilities. These were along the valley floor near the East River in the vicinity of the unincorporated town of Gothic, Colorado. Energy balance measurements were made at these locations using autonomous, single-level flux towers referred to as atmospheric surface flux stations (ASFSs). The ASFSs were deployed on 28 September 2021 at the Kettle Ponds Annex site and on 12 October 2021 at the Avery Picnic site and operated until 19 July and 21 June 2023, respectively. Measurements included basic meteorology; upward and downward longwave and shortwave radiative fluxes and subsurface conductive flux, each at 1âmin resolution; 3-D winds from a sonic anemometer and H2O/CO2 from an open-path gas analyzer, both at 20âHz from which sensible, latent heat, and CO2 fluxes were derived; and profiles of soil properties in the upper 0.5âm (both sites) and temperature profiles through the snow (at Avery Picnic), each reported between 10âmin and 6âh. The system uptime was 97â% (Kettle Ponds) and 90â% (Avery Picnic), and collectively 1184âd of data was obtained between the stations. The purpose of this article is to document the ASFS deployment at SPLASH, to document the data acquisition and post-processing of measurements, and to serve as a guide for interested users of the data sets, which are archived at Zenodo (https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10313363, Cox et al., 2023b; https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10327409, Cox et al., 2023c; https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10313894, Cox et al., 2023d; https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10307825, Cox et al., 2023e; https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10310520, Cox et al., 2023f) with the Creative Commons AttributionÂ 4.0 International license.

title: MDG625: a daily high-resolution meteorological  dataset derived by a geopotential-guided  attention network in Asia (1940–2023)
titleCn: MDG625：亚洲地区基于位势高度引导注意力网络的日分辨率气象数据集（1940–2023）
interpretationCn: 本研究提出基于位势引导注意力网络(GeoAN)的降尺度方法，通过低分辨率数据生成高精度气象数据。定量与可视化分析表明GeoAN在多数指标上表现优异，并据此构建了1940年至今的日尺度历史气象数据集MDG625。该数据集解决了长时序高分辨率气象数据获取难题，为气候研究和相关领域提供了重要数据支撑。
tags: 气象数据降尺度,历史气象重建,高分辨率数据生成,深度学习应用,长期气候数据集
Subject: 气候科学
abstract: It is hard to access long-time series and high-resolution meteorological data for past years. In this paper, we propose the Geopotential-guided Attention Network (GeoAN) for downscaling which can produce high-resolution data using given low-resolution data. Quantitative and visual comparisons reveal our GeoAN produces better results with regard to most metrics. Using GeoAN, a historical meteorological dataset called MDG625 has been produced daily for the period since 1940.
